dict.string:
Changes the backdrop style of the Keyboard. By default I have it set to a blur style but you can change it to whatever you'd like. I've made some general suggestions to try however feel free to experiment. Made after reading multiple inquiries via r/jailbreak.
[v.2] Tested with iP6+ 8.4 using stock transparency. (7-31-15)
⚑ UPDATES: (7-29-15) *Initial release (7-31-15) *Changed patch title & removed the predictive text color option. Use the patch titled "KB • Predictive Text Color" to retain this option.
- If you enjoy this patch then you may also want to try some of my other patches with the "KB •" prefix, notably...
➠ KB • Hide Predictive Text BG ➠ KB • Predictive Text Color
● If you'd like to donate via PayPal, please send money to...
☞ goin730@gmail.com
Backdrop Style: Blur=0, Light Blur=-1, Transparent=-2, Dark Alt=1, Matrix Blur=-3
